text:
@Nigel_Farage You quote an article behind a payroll, therefore the Telegraph & you are effectively hiding from scrutiny.
Where this coronavirus virus originated is debatable.  What is certain & not debatable, is the Tory Gov't's negligence, failureslies & corruption in dealing with the crisis.
